actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-392.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for sending H.R. 111, a bill to enable the United States to maintain American security and interests respecting the Panama Canal, for the duration of the Panama Canal Treaty of 1977, to conference.

summary.text: Expresses the disagreement of the House of Representatives to the Senate amendments to and requesting a conference on H.R. 111 (Panama Canal Treaty implementation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for sending H.R. 111, a bill to enable the United States to maintain American security and interests respecting the Panama Canal, for the duration of the Panama Canal Treaty of 1977, to conference.
